content.rendered:
Dominic has been involved with the MirandaNet Fellowship since it started. In one of the projects he managed at Hermitage School in Wapping, London, he involved comic artists who developed the pupils narrative skills. The comic that resulted, called Living, was based on the experience of being ‘down and out’ in London.  As part of their citizenship studies the children researched the reasons for the homelessness they saw so often in London. The project was supported  by AD 2000 and Crisis and funded by Creative Partnerships from the Arts Council of England.

Dominic is currently Content & Marketing Director at Audiotube, a music start up that is setting new standards in music video quality and syndicating independent music video across the web and beyond. This directorship brings together ten years experience in consumer marketing covering a range of products ranging from audio technology, computer games and comics. To view his profile please got to: http://www.linkedin.com/pub/dominic-preston/8/284/1b9

  • Partner Marketing Manager at Dolby Laboratories
  • Business Development at Global Initiative
  • Snr Brand Manager at SEGA Europe LTD – Entertainment
  • Marketing Manager at Codemasters Ltd
  • Marketing Manager at Microsoft – EDD – Xbox & G4W
  • Publishing & Marketing Manager     Rebellion Developments at Rebellion

Education
Dominic was educated at Whitgift School in Croydon has and has a Degree in Marketing and Law and an MBA from Oxford Brookes University
